section.title: Introduction
section.para: This chapter gives a short overview about the assembly procedure of the OpenEngSB. Furthermore a short description of the structure of the assembled project is given.

section.title: Howto assemble the OpenEngSB
section.para:
To create a distributable form of the OpenEngSB simply issue the following commands in the root directory of the project.
> mvn package -Pintegration-test,license-check,docs > cd package/assembly > mvn dependency:unpack > mvn assembly:assembly
Then a zip file is created in the folder package/assembly/target. The structure of the zip is explained in the following section. To ease this process a shell script is contained in the scripts directory (assemble.sh).

para.programlisting: openengsb-{version} | |- docs | | | |- html | |- pdf | |- bin | | | |- run.sh (start webserver with openengsb) | |- stop.sh (stop webserver with openengsb) | |- README |- LICENSE |- NOTICE | |- webserver (jetty) with openengsb.war
